attributes.action: Encourage the Minister for Equality to spend as much effort on helping men care for children as she does on women getting equal pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Men should have the right to Maternity Leave if their partner returns to work.
NHS should communicate with fathers as well as mothers to offer advice and post natal courses.
NHS should use gender neutral language (parents) rather than discriminatory 'mothers'.
NHS should abandon the use of the word 'Sister' for the nursing grade - it has religious and sexist connotations and encourages discrimination against men.
Employers should be forced to allow flexible working for men, rather than just consider it for both genders.
Men should have the right to time off accompany their partners to all ante-natal appointments.
